stats.global_save_error: Global error occurred while saving player data

cat_trap.effect_start: You were hit by {{player}}'s Meow Trap skill, vision blurred for 10 seconds

old_shoes.name: Old Man's Speed Shoes
old_shoes.introduce: Increase movement speed and jump height for 5 seconds
old_shoes.notice: Wear them to run faster and jump higher!

dash.name: Dash
dash.introduce: Dash in the direction of the crosshair, knock back when hitting players
dash.notice: Be careful not to dash too hard!

chorus_fruit.name: Chorus Fruit
chorus_fruit.introduce: Randomly teleport to existing blocks on the platform (Lucky Charm)
chorus_fruit.notice: You might teleport to blocks with cracking warnings!

bounce_tnt.name: Bounce TNT
bounce_tnt.introduce: Bounce away all TNT and bats within 4 blocks
bounce_tnt.notice: Essential team survival tool, can also bounce away annoying bats!

safe_platform.name: Rescue Platform
safe_platform.introduce: When you fall into the void, a 5√ó5 platform will generate on the bottom yellow layer and save you
safe_platform.notice: This is a one-time passive skill! No activation needed!

cat_trap.name: Meow Trap
cat_trap.introduce: Make all other players within 10 blocks gain the Meow effect for 10 seconds
cat_trap.notice: If there are three days of meowing, what will you do? Answer: We all meow like cats together

spider_man.name: Spider-Man
spider_man.introduce: Shoot webs and bounce to target position, pull when hitting players or entities
spider_man.notice: Move freely in the arena like Spider-Man! Be careful not to fall!
spider_man.web_pull_hit: You were hit by {{playerName}}'s web and pulled over!
spider_man.miss: Missed the target! Aim before shooting
spider_man.pull_message: You were hit by {{player}}'s web and pulled over!
spider_man.miss_message: Missed the target! Aim before shooting

self_sustain.name: Self-Sustain
self_sustain.introduce: Recover health every 5 seconds, recovery gradually increases up to 5 points
self_sustain.notice: This is a passive skill! No activation needed!

skill.cat_trap.effect_start: You were hit by {{player}}'s Meow Trap skill, vision blurred for 10 seconds
game.blown_into_void: Blasted into the void by TNT
